mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL((@rowNo:=@rowNo + 1),1)rowNo, IFNULL(resumeInfo1,'')resumeInfo1, IFNULL(resumeName1,'')resumeName1, IFNULL(resumeInfo2,'')resumeInfo2, IFNULL(resumeName2,'')resumeName2, IFNULL(updateTime,'')updateTime, IFNULL(updateUser,'')updateUser, count(*) FROM T015ResumeManagement ,(SELECT @rowNo:=0) AS rowNo WHERE employeeNo = #{employeeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T015ResumeManagement ( employeeNo, resumeInfo1, resumeName1, resumeInfo2, resumeName2, updateTime, createTime, updateUser ) VALUES( #{employeeNo}, #{resumeInfo1}, #{resumeName1}, #{resumeInfo2}, #{resumeName2}, now(), now(), #{employeeName} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE resumeInfo1= #{resumeInfo1}, resumeName1= #{resumeName1}, resumeInfo2= #{resumeInfo2}, resumeName2= #{resumeName2}, updateTime=now(), updateUser=#{employeeName};
